document_data.name: Kyrnill Melarn
document_data.History: Starting before [[1361 DR]] and lasting until [[1383 DR]], Kyrnill Kenafin served as the matron mother of House Kenafin. When House Kenafin and [[House Horlbar]] merged to form House Melarn, Kyrnill allowed [[Zhindia Melarn|Zhindia Horlbar]] to assume leadership of the house, expecting that Zhindia would die in a power struggle. Zhindia survived, however, and as First Priestess, Kyrnill found great pleasure in seeing Zhindia's power undermined.
